page.title: 20Primary school days.Hoo area
page.content: We get up about 7.30,get dressed & have breakfast which is cereal,toast or a sausage roll or 2 packets of crisps. If Mum is in a good mood it is a cooked breakfast. We go to school on a school bus squashed in 3 to a seat. When we get there we play till 9. Assembly is sometimes boring,then we have lessons until 12 with 15 mins break at 10.35. We have maths, english & other lessons. School lunch is O.K. favourite lunch is battered sausages and jam buns.Some of us bring packed lunch.We play till 1.15 & then have art, needlework,games, drama & other things. We go home on the school bus at 3.15, change into play clothes,have something to eat and go out to play-riding bikes, playing around on the bridge.If we are indoors it's T.v.,computer games, read- ing,Trivial Pursuit. Bed by 9.30.
